DLG ITM_a

DLG SPR_0
The only way I could go was down.

DLG SPR_1
I couldn't see a thing.

DLG ITM_1
Peter had always said that I was afraid of the wrong things.

DLG ITM_2
"""
He was full of shit, and I wasn't really afraid of anything.

"""

DLG SPR_2
"""
We kissed once.

"""

DLG SPR_3
"""
We'd kissed once.

"""

DLG ITM_3
"""
We'd kissed once.

"""

DLG ITM_4
A moment snatched, late at night when the others were sleeping.

DLG ITM_5
A moment snatched, late at night when the others were sleeping.

DLG ITM_6
"""
Then I couldn't bring myself to mention it the next day.

My silence built a wall between us.
"""

DLG ITM_7
I just wanted to savour that moment.The kiss just as the fire was dying.

DLG ITM_8
I registered for camp again full of excitement, I was looking forward to seeing him again.

DLG ITM_9
Just before dawn, I snuck out. To a cave near the camp where we'd scratched our initials.

DLG ITM_a
But he wasn't there.

END 0
But he wasn't there.

END 1
But he wasn't there.

VAR a
42
